com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts

Class ChartSeries

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts.ChartSeries
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.charts.ChartDataLabelsDataProvider, com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.charts.ChartObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineChartSeries

    public class ChartSeries
extends Object
implements com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.charts.ChartObject, com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.charts.ChartDataLabelsDataProvider
    Represents a single chart series.

    • Method Summary

      Gets the settings for the data labels for an entire series.

      Gets the series display name.

      Gets the index of this ChartSeries instance in the parent ChartSeriesCollection.
      String getName()
      Gets the series name as direct value (for example, 'My series') or as a reference to a cell with value (for example, '=Sheet1!A1').

      Gets the chart series values.

      Gets the chart series values as a cell range reference (for example, 'Sheet1!A1:D1').

        public final void delete()
        Deletes the series.

      • getDataLabels

        public final ChartDataLabels getDataLabels()
        Gets the settings for the data labels for an entire series.
        Returns:
        The settings for the data labels for an entire series.

      • getDisplayName

        public final String getDisplayName()
        Gets the series display name. If name is direct value, then name value is returned; otherwise, if name is a cell reference, then referenced cell value is returned.
        Returns:
        The series display name.

      • getIndex

        public final int getIndex()
        Gets the index of this ChartSeries instance in the parent ChartSeriesCollection.
        Returns:
        The index of this ChartSeries instance in the parent ChartSeriesCollection.

      • getName

        public final String getName()
        Gets the series name as direct value (for example, 'My series') or as a reference to a cell with value (for example, '=Sheet1!A1').
        Returns:
        The series name.

      • getValues

        public final Iterable getValues()
        Gets the chart series values.
        Returns:
        The chart series values.

      • getValuesReference

        public final String getValuesReference()
        Gets the chart series values as a cell range reference (for example, 'Sheet1!A1:D1'). Values from cells in the referenced range will be used as values of this series.
        Returns:
        The chart series values as a cell range reference.

      • isLegendEntryVisible

        public final boolean isLegendEntryVisible()
        Gets a value indicating whether legend entry for this series instance is visible.

        Default value is true.

        Returns:
        true if legend entry for this series instance is visible; otherwise, false.

      • setLegendEntryVisible

        public final void setLegendEntryVisible(boolean legendEntryVisible)
        Sets a value indicating whether legend entry for this series instance is visible.

        Default value is true.

        Parameters:
        legendEntryVisible - true if legend entry for this series instance is visible; otherwise, false.

      • setName

        public final void setName(String name)
        Sets the series name as direct value (for example, 'My series') or as a reference to a cell with value (for example, '=Sheet1!A1').
        Parameters:
        name - The series name.

        public final void setValues(Iterable values)
        Sets the chart series values.

        Throws:

        Sets the chart series values.
        Parameters:
        values - The chart series values.

      • setValuesReference

        public final void setValuesReference(String valuesReference)
        Sets the chart series values as a cell range reference (for example, 'Sheet1!A1:D1'). Values from cells in the referenced range will be used as values of this series.
        Parameters:
        valuesReference - The chart series values as a cell range reference.
